name: Onward: Asylum
description:
Onward is a 2D Covid horror-themed side-scroller game that let the players assume the role of Grace, a child that is looking for her mother upon waking up in a post-apocalyptic hospital.  Grace embarks on a small journey to look for her mother, but she must face certain challenges that will hinder the completion of her goal.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • We recommend you to wear headphones/earphones for a better gaming experience.
  • You must avoid/ hide from the CovidMonster to not get infected.
  • Interact with objects to find all the keys and some hidden puzzle to complete the level.

GAMEPLAY CONTROLS:

  • A  D or ←  →      To move the player
  • E                               To Interact object,doors/stairs or pickup item
  • Q                              To drop item
  • F                               To switch ON the switchbox
  • Shift                       To run/ enable to move fast
  • Spacebar             To jump
  • Ctrl                         To crouch (to hide at any hideable objects)
  • Esc                          To pause the game

MAIN MENU

  • ↓ ↑ or  S  W         To select choices
  • SPACEBAR        To Enter/Start
